renounceOwnership().details: Even though this function is opened, it can only be called by contract owner

setImplementation(address).details: Even though this function is opened, it can only be called by contract owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Even though this function is opened, it can only be called by contract owner

userdoc.notice: User of current proxy must be aware of simplicity nature of it, in particular case naming collision is not handled in it. Proxy parameters are written as specific slot address
